turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want to order four pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can help with that. what toppings did you want on those 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a meat lover pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want all 4 to be meat lovers?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one to be Meat Lovers, one to be chicken barbecue and two supreme.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of crust did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like extra cheese on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the order was 4 large pizzas, 1 meat lovers, 1 bbq chicken and 2 supreme pizzas, all with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $72.99 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been submitted. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, take care.
